content: **crochet snowflake pattern** snowflake crochet-along wednesday january 17 2024 5 30-7pm cst https //ravelry com/events/crochet-along-snowflake youtube tutorial https //youtu be/hdfwjievf7k 1 **materials needed** †3 25mm us d-3 crochet hook #2 fine yarn scissors **notes ** †pattern will work with larger hook and yarn **finished size**- 2 5 **stitches used** chain- chain slip_stitch- slip_stitch single_crochet- single_crochet dc3tog- double_crochet 3 together dc4tog- double_crochet 4 together picot-3 1 https //youtu be/hdfwjievf7k
